song_lyrics: Mai bharose apne Rāmke, aur na hai kachhu kāmke... °ṭek
Jo mānge so det padārath, vārī jāu īs nāmpe... Main° 1
Dou akṣhar hai sabkultārak, ant det sukh dhāmke... Main° 2
Tulsīdās Prabhu nām dayādhan, aur dev sab nāmke... Main° 3
title: Mai bharose apne Rāmke

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-315: Tulsidas

Category: Anya Hindi Pad
